name: DreadCentral
0:
”Alexa, open dread central”
”Alexa, ask dread central for the latest update”
”Alexa, start dread central”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dread central
des: Listen to the latest horror movie news from your Dread Central. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
